Module com.example.dmscoursework
Package com.example.dmscoursework.Controller

Class MusicController

java.lang.Object
com.example.dmscoursework.Controller.MusicController
public class MusicController extends Object
The MusicController is in charge of the music. The music controller is in charge of getting the music, playing, pausing, resetting, etc. The user will interact with the MusicController through the MusicScreen controller. Buttons pressed on the MusicScreen controller will call the MusicController to enact the users will.
Since:
04-01-2022
Version:
1.0
Author:
William Michiel Simson van Dijkhuizen
